modifiers.when: occupation == 'Sales/Office' and education_level in ['Less than HS', 'HS Diploma', 'Some College', "Associate's"]
household_income < 35000 and education_level in ['Less than HS', 'HS Diploma']
household_income >= 100000 and household_income < 200000 and education_level in ["Bachelor's", 'Graduate Degree']
education_level in ['Less than HS', 'HS Diploma'] and knowledge_worker == False
household_income >= 30000 and household_income < 55000 and homeownership == False
household_income >= 55000 and household_income < 90000 and homeownership == True
employment_status == 'Full-time' and homeownership == True and household_income >= 75000
conscientiousness > 0.6 and openness > 0.6 and political_ideology in ['Very Liberal', 'Liberal', 'Moderate']
